Corruptbox: A chaotic sandbox world full of surprises

Corruptbox is a unique mod that combines the strange glitch vibe of Corruptbox with the creative music world of Sprunki. Players will dive into a fresh musical universe, where familiar Sprunki characters appear in distorted and mysterious forms along with unusual sound effects.

Instead of simply creating melodies, the game offers a multi-layered experience that is both intriguing and captivating. This is what makes the mod one of the most outstanding variations in the Sprunki community.

Player experience

  • Players are free to experiment with music in an entirely different way: from combining glitch-style instruments to testing sound distortion effects.
  • Not just following a storyline, players can create your own unique glitched track, turning it into a highly personal experience.
  • Once you start, the mix of distorted visuals, unusual sound effects, and creative gameplay will keep you immersed.

How to control

  • Use the mouse to play.

  • FNAF Security Breach
